mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, user_no, restaurant_no, acco_id, review_title, review_content, review_image, review_point) values (review_seq.nextval, #{user.no}, #{restaurant.no}, #{acco.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{point})
mapper.update: update review set review_title = #{title}, review_content = #{content}, review_like_count = #{likeCount}, review_image = #{image}, review_updated_date = sysdate where review_no = #{no}
mapper.select:
select * from review rv, users u
, restaurant rs
, acco_rooms ar
rv.review_deleted = 'N' and rv.user_no = u.user_no
and rv.acco_id = #{accoId} and rv.room_no = ar.room_no
and rv.restaurant_no = #{restaurantNo} and rv.restaurant_no = rs.restaurant_no
order by rv.review_created_date desc
select * from review r, users u where restaurant_no = #{value} and r.user_no = u.user_no

with points as (select 1 as review_point from dual union all select 2 from dual union all select 3 from dual union all select 4 from dual union all select 5 from dual) select p.review_point as point, nvl(x.cnt,0) as count from points p, (select review_point, count(*) cnt from review where acco_id=#{value} group by review_point) x where x.review_point (+) = p.review_point order by p.review_point
select * from (select * from review where restaurant_no is not null order by review_created_date, restaurant_no desc) where rownum <=3
select * from review where review_created_date desc
